name: A Quiet Game
description:
This game was created for the #GamesForBlindGamers Game Jam

This is our first game created for low vision players. We challenged ourselves to provide all information by sound. It was a great learning experience, and hope that we can understand the needs of players with limited sight better as a result of this project. 

Narration is written by Xeniarta
Narration Audio created with Amazon Polly English, British Language - Emma, Female voice
Sounds created by Lessmoon

Project developed in Unity 2020.3.22f1 by Saoi

Inspiration:

Text to Speech UI Elements
Let's Play a RPG for Blind Players 
Imaginary Worlds - Playing Blind
